block.heading: Enquiry
block.paragraph: Contact us and provide us with basic information about the child and the school requirements, i.e which year are you applying for.

block.heading: School Placement Application
block.paragraph: We will recommend the most suitable schools according to the information provided, and we will help to prepare and apply for the school placement.

block.heading: Test and offer
block.paragraph: The majority of schools will require an entry test, once the child passes the test, an offer will be made, a deposit is then required to accept and secure the place.

block.heading: What is a 'guardian'?
block.paragraph: An adult or company in the UK who is appointed by a parent to be their representative while their child studies here.

block.heading: Can you provide a UK host family?
block.paragraph: An important part of our job is to find a host family for your child during holiday times when they have to leave school.

block.heading: What is the cost of your UK Guardianship Programme?
block.paragraph: Termly service fees for guardianship are £620 per term including VAT. This includes all of our services and two visits to see your child in the first term. We usually ask for an expenses fund of £500 per term to cover homestay and travel which is fully refundable if not spent.
